name: Arena Exit

choices: You hear the door to the Arena shut and lock behind you, ensuring no one can randomly enter.
The heavy wooden door into the Arena shuts behind you with a click.
The guard pulls the door closed behind you. From behind the heavy wooden door you hear a distinct click of locks securing it shut.

desc: You go through the doorway headed towards where you first entered the arena. $descRandom
As you exit the arena, you feel a sense of calm wash over you. $descRandom
The exit leads you back to the outside world, away from the chaos and excitement of the arena. $descRandom
Leaving the arena behind, you can't help but wonder what challenges await you next.$descRandom
